name: Cookie Crush - Cookie Game
description:
Enjoy the excitement of classic fun & relax game. Wish to play by simply swiping on the screen!
Interesting levels, all you want is in this new splash game. Experience the variant stages and effects of unique
- Match cookie to make special power ups & boosts
- More than 600++ challenging levels & many game in pretty scenes.
- Blast through unique levels & explore exotic locales around the world

Do not miss your best score - Let's go and never stop!
Thanks & Enjoy
